Only official upstream OpenStack projects are included, not non-OpenStack add-ons that originate elsewhere. If the service is not listed in the table then it is not present in .

section.title: Relation of Services with OpenStack stable/kilo
section.p: The general policy for is that each service is kept up to date versus upstream OpenStack stable/kilo.

body.p: Automated jobs run nightly to mirror upstream OpenStack stable/kilo down to HPE Helion OpenStack's internal code mirror so, unless the sync job fails, each service should be up to date. The level of drift between upstream OpenStack stable/kilo and what is included in the build is summarised here. This is automated output from all the OpenStack repos included in the daily builds.
Note that Ceilometer, Nova, Horizon, Keystone and Cinder have >2 local patches.The detailed list of all missing patches and all local patches is here.
OpenStack Kilo Stable Patch Release Schedule

The schedule for patch releases for OpenStack Kilo is at Planned stable/kilo releases (9 months). Note that 2015.1.1 released in July and 2015.1.2 is due in mid-Sept. What 'version' of OpenStack Kilo will ship with?As per above, is built from code which is sync'd nightly with upstream OpenStack stable/kilo. will therefore ship with the latest Kilo patches as of the final build of . In other words, the plan is that it will be more up to date than the 2015.1.2 "Kilo patch release".
